## ERC20Config interface

Constructor config for standard Open Zeppelin ERC20.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ERC20Config 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [distributor](./rain-sdk.erc20config.distributor.md) | string | Distributor address of the initial supply. MAY be zero. |
|  [initialSupply](./rain-sdk.erc20config.initialsupply.md) | BigNumberish | Initial supply to mint. |
|  [name](./rain-sdk.erc20config.name.md) | string | Name as defined by Open Zeppelin ERC20. |
|  [symbol](./rain-sdk.erc20config.symbol.md) | string | Symbol as defined by Open Zeppelin ERC20. |
